metadata.title: CVE-2015-5805 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: WebKit, as used in Apple iOS before 9 and iTunes before 12.3, allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memorycorruption and application crash) via a crafted web site, a differentvulnerability than other WebKit CVEs listed in APPLE-SA-2015-09-16-1 andAPPLE-SA-2015-09-16-3.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
